# setValue(_:for:)

**Instance Method**

Set the value of one of the properties, using an enumeration value instead of a property name.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func setValue(_ value: Int?, for component: Calendar.Component)
```

## Discussion

The calendar and timeZone and isLeapMonth properties cannot be set by this method.

## Accessing Calendar Components

- **value(for:)**: Returns the value of one of the properties, using an enumeration value instead of a property name.
- **Calendar.Component**: An enumeration for the various components of a calendar date.
